title: 皐月賞の後に・まずは腹ごしらえ

text_block_list.text: First place, Matikanetannhauser--!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah, hah...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Huh, I'm in first place!?

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Huh, Matikanetannhauser is in first place!?

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon ran pretty well too, but
races really are unpredictable...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, I did it~!?
(Waaah--!!)

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Defeat...

The racecourse, where expectations for Mihono Bourbon had been building,
was filled with a strange stir.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Wow~, we did it!
The first step toward becoming a Triple Crown Umamusume!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Next, the 'Japanese Derby' at this pace--

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, whoa,
what's that... Bourbon-san?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Due to not winning the 'Satsuki Sho'...
achieving the Triple Crown is impossible.
My and my father's one and only dream is--!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...Oxygen supply volume lower than usual.
Cause unknown. Proceeding with rapid deep breaths.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Shoo... haa...
Shoo... haa...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...
...Phew... Next is the 'Japanese Derby'.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Even if the result is defeat,
I cannot stop my legs.

Mihono Bourbon hurries away.
As if chasing her...
a small shadow comes running.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon-san...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...No, this isn't the time to be worried.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Rice, today was a total failure. If things stay like this... I won't reach Bourbon-san.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I can't become a Rice that can make everyone smile...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I have to get stronger, much, much stronger...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...That's right. It's normal to be happy when you win and frustrated when you lose.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But to immediately look ahead to the next with such strong determination! You two are amazing, as expected...!

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: Ah, um! That was a wonderful victory, congratulations...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Ah, thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: And, um, if you don't mind, could you share a word of your enthusiasm for the 'Japanese Derby'...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Enthusiasm! Enthusiasm, enthusiasm~... umm...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I won't lose either~!

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: Mhm mhm. 'Won't lose'...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes!

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: ... Umm, is that all...?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes!

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: Ah...! O-okay...! Thank you very much...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ehe! I'll do my best~!
The atmosphere feels a bit lackadaisical, but... knowing her, if she says she'll 'do her best,' she probably intends to properly give it her all.
Next is the 'Japanese Derby.' I can't let this slip away!
